ygData.subject: Re: shadowmen?
ygData.msgSnippet: Shadow Men are Necro s mortal enemies so we hate them. Naeeldar ... From: Mark Muller  To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
Shadow Men are Necro's mortal enemies so we hate them.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Mark Muller <markm@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, October 21, 1999 5:10 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] shadowmen?


>From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Tony B <tonyb72@...>
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Sent: Friday, October 22, 1999 1:05 PM
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] shadowmen?
>
>
>> From: "Tony B" <tonyb72@...>
>>
>> what kind of faction hit do they give you, and are they considered
undead?
>>
>> belphenor
>
>Their faction last I checked was numerical :P but I think you gain faction
>with the temple of Sol Ro, and lose it with some unknown...probably the
>shadowed men, but don't quote me on that. They're not undead...but they
are
>"summoned" (ward summoned line works great against them)
>
>>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
